FuncDef: The reset igmp-snooping statistics command clears the statistics of IGMP snooping.
CLIs: reset igmp-snooping statistics { vlan { <vlan-id> | all } | vsi { name <vsi-name> | all } | bridge-domain { <bd-id> | all } | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a VLAN.
The value ranges from 1 to 4094.

Clears the statistics of all VLANs.
-

Clears the statistics of all VLANs and VSIs.
-

Clears the statistics of all VSIs.
-

Specifies the name of a VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Clears the statistics of all broadcast bridge domains.
-

Specifies the ID of a bridge domain.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear the statistics of IGMP snooping in specified scope, use the reset igmp-snooping statistics command.
